import React from 'react'; import { Link } from 'react-router-dom'; import { FaPhone, FaEnvelope, FaMapMarkerAlt, FaFacebook, FaInstagram, FaLinkedin, FaTwitter, FaArrowUp } from 'react-icons/fa'; const Footer = () => { const scrollToTop = () => { window.scrollTo({ top: 0, behavior: 'smooth' }); }; const quickLinks = [ { name: 'About Us', path: '/about' }, { name: 'Our Programs', path: '/programs' }, { name: 'Upcoming Events', path: '/events' }, { name: 'Gallery', path: '/gallery' }, { name: 'News & Blog', path: '/news' }, { name: 'Testimonials', path: '/testimonials' }, { name: 'Contact Us', path: '/contact' }, { name: 'Join Us', path: '/join' } ]; const programs = [ 'School Student Skill Development', 'University Workshops', 'Government Officer Training', 'Professional Skill Building', 'One-on-One Counselling', 'Custom Corporate Training' ]; const socialLinks = [ { icon: FaFacebook, href: '#', label: 'Facebook' }, { icon: FaInstagram, href: '#', label: 'Instagram' }, { icon: FaLinkedin, href: '#', label: 'LinkedIn' }, { icon: FaTwitter, href: '#', label: 'Twitter' } ]; return (
